<title level="2" right="Creature 8">[King Merlokrep](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2179)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="LE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
<trait label="Kobold" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=224" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Crown of the Kobold King](/Sources.aspx?ID=148) pg. 109</row>

**Perception** +16; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +18, [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +16, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +16, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +14, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +20, [Mining Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +14, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +18

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +6

**Con** +4

**Int** +2

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +6
</row>

**Items**
[_Crown of the Kobold King_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1727), [_Man-Feller_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1732), gold horn bangles worth 12 gp, 2 gold lip rings, oversized red and gold satin cloak with a crude painting of a gold dragon on the back

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 26 

**Fort** +14 

**Ref** +18 

**Will** +16 

</row>

**HP** 140

**Rise from Death** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) If King Merlokrep is slain, the _Crown of the Kobold King_ glows brighter with an awful yellow radiance; this light slithers down inside the dead kobold's flesh, emanating from within as his body begins to twitch and writhe. If the Crown is allowed to remain on his head for 3 rounds, King Merlokrep rises from death as an [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160) Kobold King—this restores him to full hit points and grants him the Undead trait (along with [negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42) and susceptibility to positive energy). Once the undead king is defeated, he remains destroyed—the absorbed energy of the Third Seal allows him to Rise from Death only once. If the Crown is removed before 3 rounds pass, the light winks out, and the energy absorbed by the Third Seal dissipates harmlessly.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_battle axe_ +19 ([Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194)),
**Damage** 2d8+7 slashing

**Arcane Spontaneous Spells** DC 26 (DC 27 with emotional spells)
- **Cantrips (4th)**
[Dancing Lights](/Spells.aspx?ID=58), [Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Electric Arc](/Spells.aspx?ID=97), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280)
- **1st**
[_fear_](/Spells.aspx?ID=110)<sup>E</sup>, [Feather Fall](/Spells.aspx?ID=111), [_magic missile_](/Spells.aspx?ID=180)<sup>S</sup>
- **2nd**
[_dispel magic_](/Spells.aspx?ID=78)<sup>S</sup>, [_hideous laughter_](/Spells.aspx?ID=150)<sup>E</sup>, [Mirror Image](/Spells.aspx?ID=197)
- **3rd**
[_fireball_](/Spells.aspx?ID=119)<sup>S</sup>, [Levitate](/Spells.aspx?ID=170), [Paralyze](/Spells.aspx?ID=213)
- **4th**
[_confusion_](/Spells.aspx?ID=48)<sup>E</sup>, [_phantasmal killer_](/Spells.aspx?ID=219)<sup>E</sup>, [Weapon Storm](/Spells.aspx?ID=373)

**<sup>S</sup> Signature spell <sup>E</sup> emotion spell**   

**Imperious Retreat** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104), [Move](/Traits.aspx?ID=114)) **Requirements** King Merlokrep is adjacent to at least one enemy; **Effect** King Merlokrep whips his fabulous satin cloak into the face of an adjacent creature and attempts an [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) check against that creature's Will DC. On a success, the creature is humiliated and distracted by the act and is [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) until the end of King Merlokrep's next turn. King Merlokrep then Strides up to his Speed and gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against reactions triggered by this movement. He must end this movement in a space that isn't adjacent to any enemy.

**Signature Spells**   King Merlokrep can cast any of his signature spells (indicated on his list of spontaneous spells above with an <sup>S</sup>) as heightened versions freely.

**[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)**   King Merlokrep deals an additional 1d6 precision damage to [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creatures.

</column>
